name: Split Apart (The_Hat_Guy)
description:
Controls

  • A / D - move
  • SPACE / W - jump
  • E - Place shadow (must have joined with shadow)
  • Q - Swap with shadow (must have placed shadow)
  • R - Retry puzzle (goes to the last puzzle start)
  • ESC - Pause

This game was made in 3 days for the Mini Jam 103: Darkness with the limitation "You are your own enemy". The limitation is used with the character being locked in puzzles by itself.

Thanks for checking this game out!
